## InstallAgentsHappsOptions.agentsDnas property

An array of DNAs for each agent (2-dimensional array) or an array of DNAs and an agent pub key.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
agentsDnas: DnaSource[][] | Array<{
        dnas: DnaSource[];
        agentPubKey: AgentPubKey;
    }>;
```
